topic.title: Bidirectional Text Support in Text Mode

body.p: Bidirectional documents contain text in both directionalities, usually involving characters from different types of alphabets.

The bidirectional editing mode can affect can affect certain fonts (CJK/east-asian). In case you encounter this issue, go to Options Preferences Editor Open/Save and select Disable bidirectional editing mode. In case you open very large documents, the bidirectional editing support can be disabled to enhance performance while editing.
body.note: Bidirectional content in the text mode cannot rendered using Bold and Italic.
